desc: QuickChange Men's Incontinence Wrap is the top new incontinence product for bed-bound men. Use on its own, or as a booster/liner within adult briefs. Change the man in 60 seconds, no rolling or lifting necessary. Replace external catheters, one-size, disposable, latex-free, holds 17oz. Hundreds of 5-Star reviews.

layout.text: Introducing QuickChange, a new continence product for bed bound and wheelchair using men.
